A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sadly\, I really didn't like this one. I'm a big Star Wars fan and it was pretty disappointing to see such a mess of a movie. Other reviewers have written extensively on the movie's shortcomings and I don't have much to add to what has already been said. Turning a childhood hero into a mopey\, alien sea cow milking loser was the ultimate injustice to the franchise. I have no interest in episode IX.
